Posts.Content: I WAS Same AFTER Round 1 OF Folfirinox x spent 4 days in hospital and was worried this would be same after each treatment but not the case. My counts had been low after my round 2 but did muster and in space of week went from. 6 to 1.2 then 2.3 so had round three. It is lonely when you can't do much in isolation x you are doing amazingly well x Mega Hugs xxx Linda x
Posts.Title: Feeling lonely in hospital
